commands.name: az signalr network-rule list
commands.summary: Get the Network access control of SignalR Service.

commands.name: az signalr network-rule update
commands.summary: Update the Network access control of SignalR Service.
examples: az signalr network-rule update --public-network -n MySignalR -g MyResourceGroup --allow RESTAPI
az signalr network-rule update --connection-name MyPrivateEndpointConnection -n MySignalR -g MyResourceGroup --allow ClientConnection ServerConnection
az signalr network-rule update --public-network --connection-name MyPrivateEndpointConnection1 MyPrivateEndpointConnection2 -n MySignalR -g MyResourceGroup --deny ClientConnection
